demo_account.notes: Demo account for App Store review. Full access to all features except premium subscriptions.

app_review_information.notes: Stellr is an astrology-based dating app that connects users through celestial compatibility. The app includes photo verification, secure messaging, and premium features. Please use the demo account for testing all functionality.
